meanings.sent1: Her understanding of deductibilities helped her save money on taxes.
meanings.sent2: The accountant explained the deductibilities to the client.
meanings.sent3: The deductibilities of the expenses made the financial report more interesting.
meanings.sent4: In the world of finance, deductibilities are like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: Learning about deductibilities is like unlocking a secret code to financial savings.

meanings.definition: The amount that can be deducted from taxes.
meanings.sent1: He carefully calculated the deductibilities to maximize his tax refund.
meanings.sent2: The deductibilities significantly reduced the overall tax burden.
meanings.sent3: Finding out the deductibilities was like finding money in an old jacket pocket.
meanings.sent4: The deductibilities were a lifeline for many struggling taxpayers.
meanings.sent5: Understanding deductibilities is key to managing tax liabilities effectively.

meanings.definition: The state of being able to be subtracted or removed.
meanings.sent1: The deductibilities of the unnecessary expenses were clear after the audit.
meanings.sent2: The deductibilities of errors were corrected in the final report.
meanings.sent3: The deductibilities of the extra weight made the diet seem more achievable.
meanings.sent4: Letting go of the deductibilities of past mistakes is liberating.
meanings.sent5: The deductibilities of negative thoughts can lead to a happier life.
